lines: 3m medical tape 1522, double sided transparent polyethylene, 80# liner, 48 in x 72 yd
rolled medical double-sided tape (1522) contains 3 mil thick transparent polyethylene film, double-sided coating with no adhesive addition of acrylic gel
a variety of substrates can be attached
can be used for medical equipment

customers leverage 3m technical expertise to select materials and technologies that integrate together for their break-through medical industry, device innovations designed for improving or enhancing lives.
